Plan <http://bit.ly/Nfc2mS>. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, PLAN <http://bit.ly/Nfc2mS>is the fourth, final step in VMTurbo's path to perpetual virtual health.
Things change. Take continental drift for example. However, in a virtual data center, things change fast. That's why we've built VMTurbo Operations Manager to not only CONVERGE and CONTROL your environment moment-to-moment, but also to PLAN <http://bit.ly/Nfc2mS> for hypothetical changes that have yet to occur.
What would a server or storage hardware refresh do? What if you merged clusters or consolidated data centers? What if a polar bear swims to the mainland? VMTurbo's advanced planning functionality handles all this and more. Our Plan video <http://bit.ly/Nfc2mS> in the Evaluation Resource Center demonstrates how to execute planning scenarios, to ensure you're getting the most out of your VMTurbo trial.
Questions, comments, or feedback? Let's plan a free assessment <http://bit.ly/1gzh9Hf>.
